website_summaries.verdict: Kaplan is a leader in standardized test strategies. We recommend this for students who prefer an online element.
pros: Over 1,000 practice questions, including thorough explanations
Video tutorials and online practice sessions
Diagnostic pretest determines strengths and weaknesses
Instructions on using the approved GED test's calculator
cons: Online components may not be available, or there is an additional charge
some students may find it challenging to study

customer_reviews.title: Staying focused and you’ll pass guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: I like how thick the book is so a lot of stuff to cover. I got the book so I can refresh up so I can take the tes in April. I think this book is really going to help!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helped me with GED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book in March and also attended adult school classes. PLEASE BUY THIS BOOK. This book taught me more than my teachers did and I passed all my GED tests. The English and Science sections were almost identical to the test and I was so relieved to have studied the right material. Make sure you use the online courses too! its very helpful before test day. Good luck future graduates!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Campos

customer_reviews.title: A must have study aid for the GED
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the "heavy" looks fool you, this book is light as a feather due to the paper. What I love the most is that it has helpful tips throughout the margins and gives you plenty of practice test to determine your strong points and your weak points. It gives you the page numbers to better help you understand the areas where you need the more help in so you don't have to waste time studying the whole book when all you need is a little section. Lord willing, I'll finally ace my GED and be on my way to join the army. Let's get to studying! We got this!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin KJV

customer_reviews.title: it Works
customer_reviews.text: Kaplan Books are probably the best books you can use to get your GED if you are trying to achieve it on your own my son has a learning disability where it mimic's dyslexia this book helps him to achieve what many others can not he can do things out of this book that he can not do in a class room , Teachers sometimes do not have time or Patience with students like my son they have shoved him aside I praise the ones that do and I praise this kind of method for helping the kids out there to achieve what many others need.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: Looking at online testing and saw that the reviewers were more inclined to recommend this book, with online test included. Using it now and is so well done. Easy to understand and work with. Test showed where we needed work and will take it again, once we have finished current unit. Highly recommend this above everything else - and believe me when I say we have tried everything!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Complete, easy to read and understand.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much, this book is very cmplete, easy to understand and with the concrete information. I’m glad I got it, I will have my test on March, will write a new review after my test.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Correa

customer_reviews.title: To help with passing score for G.E.D
customer_reviews.text: I brought this book to help my G/F to get her GED an also to help her score
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Only book needed to pass GED tests
customer_reviews.text: This book is so good and over prepares you for each test. The online resources are great. The best part is the mock practice test on each subject to see how you will do on the actual test. My 17 year old that had only completed 9th grade studied this book and was able to pass her GED tests all within 3 months. Definitely recommend this book for anyone wanting to prepare for GED tests.
customer_reviews.author: DianaE81022

customer_reviews.title: Math Error in Social studies.. don't know if I can trust the book
customer_reviews.text: I just started using my book and just noticed a math error! How can I trust a GED book with a math error?? At this point I don't know if there are more.. Unfortunate I am 3 days passed my return window.. this really sucks! I hope not all books have this typo.. now I can't use this book :/

customer_reviews.title: It's your best bet if you want to pass the test.
